summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel features completed. All 20 backend API tests passed. Frontend testing verified: Admin login, Dashboard with live stats, Sold Items page, Email/Stripe/Storage/Security settings with enable toggles, Inquiries with expandable booking details, Products and Gallery with Bulk Add modals.
passed_tests: Admin Dashboard showing live stats (products, gallery, bookings, users, orders, sold items)
Dashboard Total Revenue and Inquiry Breakdown sections
Admin Sold Items page with empty state display
Admin Email Settings page with enable toggle and provider configuration
Admin Stripe Settings (Payments) with enable/disable toggle
Admin Cloud Storage Settings with enable/disable toggle
Admin Security Settings with SMS and CAPTCHA toggles
Admin Inquiries page with expandable booking details
Admin Products page with Bulk Add button and modal
Admin Gallery page with Bulk Add functionality
Bulk Add modal shows Saved Items panel (0/10)
Bulk Add modal has Next/Back/Done buttons
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin panel features are working correctly. Dashboard shows live stats from backend. Settings pages have enable/disable toggles. Bulk Add modals for Products and Gallery have saved items panel on left, form on right, max 10 entries with Next/Back/Done buttons. Test connection buttons are MOCKED and simulate successful connections for known providers.

mocked_apis.note: Test connection buttons (Email, Stripe, Storage, SMS, CAPTCHA) are MOCKED - they simulate successful connections but don't make real API calls to external services
